alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 7:03PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nez Perce and southwestern Lewis Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 603 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Craigmont, or 20 miles west of Kamiah, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Craigmont, Winchester, and Reubens. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 268 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
